QuestData.Title: Starve a Fever, Feed a Cold
QuestData.Description: Mack is fading in and out of consciousness.$b$bIf he's going to make it, he's going to need all the help we can muster.$b$bI know a good recipe for turtle soup that's sure to warm him up.$b$bBring me some turtle meat and I'll handle the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Turtle Meats from Speckled Sea Turtles.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Samir in Smuggler's Scar.
